verses.name: Leviticus 8:20
verses.text: And he cut the ram into pieces; and Moses burnt the head, and the pieces, and the fat.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:21
verses.text: And he washed the inwards and the legs in water; and Moses burnt the whole ram upon the altar: it was a burnt sacrifice for a sweet savour, and an offering made by fire unto the Lord; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Leviticus 8:22
verses.text: And he brought the other ram, the ram of consecration: and Aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the ram.
